method.text: Put the citrus rind and juice, butter and sugar in a bowl over a pan of hot water. Stir to dissolve the sugar and melt the butter.
Pour the eggs into the citrus mixture. Stir and cook over a gentle heat until it is thick and coats the back of the spoon.
Pot into hot sterilised jars. Seal, cover and label. Store for 1 month.
Once opened, keep in the fridge.
